title: Let Kotori Do It Too!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hey, Eli-chan. I heard about this from Karin-san, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What is it, Kotori? You look so serious....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eli-chan.... You became Karin-san’s outfit model, right? She said that she had you try on a lot of clothes at the store....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>W-, well.... I just.... felt like it that day.... But, it just kind of happened, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>No fair! Kotori wants Eli-chan to wear all kinds of clothes that Kotori picked too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Please, Eli-chan....! Let me do it too....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I guess it’s okay.... Then, you need to also wear clothes that I picked, okay Kotori. Karin did that too, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course! Ehehe, I’m so happy! Then, let’s go to the store right away~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>W-, wait, don’t suddenly pull me like that, it’s dangerous!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
